biotools.summary: RepeatExplorer is a computational pipeline designed to identify and characterize repetitive DNA elements in next-generation sequencing data from plant and animal genomes. It employs graph-based clustering of sequence reads to identify repetitive elements and several additional programs that aid in their annotation and quantification.

bioschemas.name: RepeatExplorer
